meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a mastodon in size or strength.
meanings.sent1: The mastodonic elephant towered over the other animals in the jungle.
meanings.sent2: The mastodonic mountain cast a shadow over the entire valley.
meanings.sent3: The mastodonic cake was so huge that it took three people to carry it.
meanings.sent4: Her mastodonic strength in the gym made her the talk of the town.
meanings.sent5: The mastodonic waves crashed against the shore, creating a mesmerizing sight.

meanings.sent1: The mastodonic ship could carry hundreds of passengers across the ocean.
meanings.sent2: The mastodonic building stood tall in the city skyline.
meanings.sent3: The mastodonic burger was so big that it barely fit on the plate.
meanings.sent4: His mastodonic appetite surprised everyone at the dinner table.
meanings.sent5: The mastodonic tree provided shade for the entire park on hot summer days.
